features.Description: Users can easily create assignments, specifying details like title, description, marks, difficulty level, and due date.
Users can manage their assignments, including creating, updating, and deleting them as needed.
Users can browse and take assignments as individuals, filtering based on difficulty levels, and viewing assignment details.
Users can submit their assignments and grade their friends' assignments, providing marks and feedback.
User accounts are protected with secure authentication methods, including email/password and social logins (e.g., Google and GitHub).
Users can easily mark submitted assignments, helping maintain a transparent and organized grading system.
The application offers a fully responsive design, ensuring a seamless experience on various devices.
All assignments are organized with pagination for easy navigation and accessibility.
The application includes robust error handling to ensure smooth user interactions and proper feedback in case of issues.
Users can preview PDF submissions directly within the application, making it convenient to review assignments.
The application employs JWT tokens for secure user authentication and authorization on private routes.
The application features engaging animations to enhance the user experience.
